alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 10:19AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, except up to 1 inch in Elk River. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Untreated surfaces will become icy Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
